name: Safari-sur-Seine
description: The old-school satchel redefined for the Safari Sur Seine line.A series of bags for men living and working in the urban jungle. The raw and authentic detailing gives the line its “lodge” style, evoking comfort and luxury.

name: Kickflip Backpack
description: 45 x 29 x 19 cm, 17.7 x 11.4 x 7.5 inch, 16 liter, water repellent fabric, unlined, two-way zip closure, side pocket with zip closure, mesh side pocket, board fixation with plastic clickers

name: Tramp Backpack
shortDesc: Explore the world with the tramp backpack
description: 45 x 29 x 19 cm, 17.7 x 11.4 x 7.5 inch, 16 liter, water repellent fabric, unlined, two-way zip closure, side pocket with zip closure, mesh side pocket, board fixation with plastic clickers

name: Newman Backpack
shortDesc: A simple backpack for your short travels
description: 45 x 29 x 19 cm, 17.7 x 11.4 x 7.5 inch, 16 liter, water repellent fabric, unlined, two-way zip closure, side pocket with zip closure, mesh side pocket, board fixation with plastic clickers

name: Heritage Backpack
description: Using durable and lightweight 12 oz cotton canvas, the Heritage Select is a classic Herschel Supply silhouette featuring unique construction. Fully lined with our signature coated poly fabric, Up to 15'' lap top sleeve pocket. Exposed brass & copper zipper, vegetable tanned leather details

name: Travel Trolley
shortDesc: Carhartt WIP x UDG Travel Trolley M
description: 100% Polyester Canvas, 56 x 35 x 26 cm, durable travel trolley - not only for Djs, exclusively made by UDG, main zip closure with lock, stretch zones around zippered main compartments, two front compartments, rectractable handle with 2-stage internal trolley system smooth, replaceable wheels

name: Wheeled Gear Bag
description: Carhartt Legacy 20'' gear bag. The Legacy Series uses heavy-duty 1200D poly treated with our Rain Defender durable water repellant formula and reinforced with Duravax to further protect the bags from tears and abrasions. Triple-stitch reinforcements, and YKK zippers and robust organization have prepared these bags to endure the rigors and demands of hard work.

name: Campaign Luggage
description: The perfect carry on suitcase, featuring a mesh partitioned main compartment for effective organization. Campaign Luggage meets carry on sizing for most major airlines. A pleated front exterior pocket, wheels, and an extendable handle makes the Campaign perfect for all your travels.

name: Clark Messenger
description: The Clark Messenger is a large volume messenger designed to be the perfect carryall. I comes with a removable strap and is perfect for work, travel or school.
